content.rendered:
[vc_row height_ratio=”100″ tablet_sm_height_ratio=”80″ mobile_height_ratio=”100″ min_height=”450″ rc_font_color=”#ffffff”][vc_column width=”1/2″ vertical_content_position=”middle” rc_heading_color=”light” tablet_sm_width=”2-3″]

Server Based Webkey Solutions

for your business

[vc_column_text animation=”eut-fade-in-left” animation_delay=”1200″ animation_duration=”slow”]

We at Webkey understand every business decision is influenced based on a multitude of factors. We have developed our application to be customizable to help your business grow and flourish; this is also the reason we offer you Webkey as a server based software solution.
With this solution we offer you the possibility to run Webkey on your devices from a locally hosted server on a local access network. Enjoy all Webkey features with a higher level of security, more control on downtimes and a tailored financial set-up

[/vc_column_text]

Contact us
[vc_column_text]
[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ tablet_sm_width=”1-3″ mobile_width=”hide”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”custom” rc_bg_type=”gradient” rc_bg_gradient_color_1=”rgba(0,0,0,0.01)” rc_bg_gradient_color_2=”#000000″ rc_bg_gradient_direction=”180″ rc_font_color=”#ffffff” padding_top=”10%”][vc_column width=”1/2″ rc_heading_color=”light”]

Advantages of the server based application

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][/vc_column][vc_column]
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ rc_heading_color=”light”]

Security

[vc_column_text animation=”eut-fade-in” animation_delay=”400″ animation_duration=”slow”]with the server based application your data will be stored on a dedicated server or even on your own LAN network[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ rc_heading_color=”light”]

Independence

[vc_column_text animation=”eut-fade-in” animation_delay=”400″ animation_duration=”slow”]Optionally, we will help you with the set-up, but the support can be run by your own teams. You will be in control of any maintenance down-times[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ rc_heading_color=”light”]

Unlimited

[vc_column_text animation=”eut-fade-in” animation_delay=”400″ animation_duration=”slow”]Unlimited devices can be added with no extra costs or any other limitations. You can integrate Webkey as part of your future solution at your own pace. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ rc_heading_color=”light”]

Financial

[vc_column_text animation=”eut-fade-in” animation_delay=”400″ animation_duration=”slow”]One off cost or recurring fees: we are flexible to meet your needs[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column]
[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text animation=”eut-fade-in-left” animation_delay=”300″ animation_duration=”very-slow”][/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Unitech, Taiwan
Unitech is a Taiwanese barcode scanner manufacturer. For security reasons they were looking for a partner that integrates with their MDM solution. Webkey has provided Unitech with a server based remote access to their devices, that now runs on their local access network.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text animation=”eut-fade-in-right” animation_delay=”300″ animation_duration=”very-slow”][/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Brooklyn, New York
With speakers all across the US in reatail stores, they wanted to save time and energy on maintenance and IT management. Webkey has helped Activaire integrate their own with solution for a centrally managed IT maintenance system.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
Server Packages
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row height_ratio=”100″ padding_top_multiplier=”” padding_bottom_multiplier=”” rc_bg_type=”gradient” rc_bg_gradient_color_1=”#000000″ rc_bg_gradient_color_2=”rgba(51,37,50,0.91)” rc_bg_gradient_direction=”180″ tablet_sm_height_ratio=”80″ mobile_height_ratio=”100″][vc_column vertical_content_position=”middle” text_align=”center” rc_heading_color=”light”]

At Webkey, we believe that every business is unique and therefore our server based app solution is designed to be highly customizable.
The server based Webkey app is a perfect tool for enterprises with a large or rapidly growing number of devices or businesses where the enhanced level of security is a must.

Get in touch with us today so we can design the perfect plan for your business!

Contact us
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
